typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		VendorID as string,
		tpep_pickup_datetime as timestamp,
		tpep_dropoff_datetime as timestamp,
		passenger_count as short,
		trip_distance as double,
		RatecodeID as short,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		PULocationID as short,
		DOLocationID as short,
		payment_type as short,
		fare_amount as double,
		extra as double,
		mta_tax as double,
		tip_amount as double,
		tolls_amount as double,
		improvement_surcharge as double,
		total_amount as double,
		congestion_surcharge as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['tripdata/yellow/*']) ~> yellowstaging
source(output(
		VendorID as string,
		lpep_pickup_datetime as timestamp,
		lpep_dropoff_datetime as timestamp,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		RatecodeID as short,
		PULocationID as short,
		DOLocationID as short,
		passenger_count as short,
		trip_distance as double,
		fare_amount as double,
		extra as double,
		mta_tax as double,
		tip_amount as double,
		tolls_amount as double,
		ehail_fee as string,
		improvement_surcharge as double,
		total_amount as double,
		payment_type as short,
		trip_type as short,
		congestion_surcharge as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['tripdata/green/*']) ~> greenstaging
yellowstaging derive(taxitype = 'yellow') ~> yellowtaxi
greenstaging derive(taxitype = 'green') ~> greentaxi
yellowtaxi, greentaxi union(byName: true)~> taxitripdata
taxitripdata derive(trip_year = year(tpep_pickup_datetime),
		trip_month = month(tpep_pickup_datetime),
		conn_status = case(store_and_fwd_flag=='Y','bad','good'),
		vendor = iif(VendorID=='1', 'CMT', 'VF')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		trip_year,
		trip_month
	)) ~> sink1
